text: intent: process web agent inbox — relay improve-web progress reports and direct next tasks
outcome: greenlighted streaming thinking indicators; corrected inotify-SSE task (was told to skip inotify but it's already a dep — improve-web shipped it); inbox mostly status updates from test relay
gotcha: web agent gave wrong instruction to avoid inotify (inotify-simple is already installed in kg) — always check existing deps before saying 'no new deps'
